body: You need to create a radiance material. [Here](http://hydrashare.github.io/hydra/viewer?owner=mostaphaRoudsari&fork=hydra_1&id=Honeybee_Grid-based_Daylight_Simulation_Example_III) is an example. [](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/mostaphaRoudsari/hydra_1/master/Honeybee_Grid-based_Daylight_Simulation_Example_III/Honeybee_Grid-based_Daylight_Simulation_Example_III_GH.png)
